articles.author: Maria Cohut
articles.title: Experts condemn 'rumors and misinformation' about coronavirus - Medical News Today
articles.description: International public health experts have issued a statement expressing concerns over the spread of conspiracy theories about the new coronavirus.
articles.content:
Scientists from nine countries have issued a joint statement strongly condemning conspiracy theories surrounding the origin of the new coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) and urging those who cultivate the rumors to consider the harmful consequences of misinformation.
… [+3353 chars]
